thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: Grace MA
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Grace MA

author: Grace MA
title: Grace MA
text:
The ordering and receiving of the replacement carbon was completed without incident ($230.00). Was told that the changing of the carbon could be done easily. Wrong! Ended up hiring plumber (Simply Green) to complete the job. Cost=$725.35 Every FIVE years for this!!
Had the anodes checked as it was changed five years ago as well. Good news! The Pelican is doing a good job - no core wire(s) were exposed!
